ActivityComments.Name: The name of the activity.  If available, a picture will be named 'Name.png'
ActivityComments.Entertainment: Amount of points added to/subtracted from  from your 'Entertainment' score
ActivityComments.SME: Amount of points added to/subtracted from  your 'Social Media Engagement' score
ActivityComments.Stamina: Amount of points added to/subtracted from stamina by this activity
ActivityComments.Cost: Cost in dollars for the activity
ActivityComments.Duration: Duration of one instance of the activity in hours
ActivityComments.CountsAsSleep: Whether or not this activity should be considered sleep.  Sleeping has no effect on hunger/thirst
ActivityComments.DayOnly: Whether an activity is only doable between 8 AM and midnight
ActivityComments.ResetsThirst: If true, counts as drinking something and resets thirst to 0
ActivityComments.ResetsHunger: If true, counts as eating something and resets hunger to 0
